name: Pairwise Similarity (gig-map)
description: Calculate the pairwise amino acid similarity for all pairs of genes in a collection

genes.help: File containing all genes to be compared, in amino acid FASTA format (gzip-compressed).

min_coverage.help: Minimum proportion of a gene which must align in order to retain the alignment

max_evalue.help: Maximum E-value threshold used to filter all alignments

map_batchsize.help: Number of genes to align in a batch

aligner.help: Algorithm used for alignment (default: diamond, options: diamond, blast)

nxf_profile.help: Profile used for resource allocation (standard or testing)
